description.narrative: The project is intended to increase the yield of the existing raw water sources by some 4.9 million cubic meters representing an increase of about fifty percent in order to ensure continuity of supply after 1990. The selected scheme will permit the objective to be met with 95% reliability, that is with the probability of the capacity falling below the demand once in twenty years, only until 1993. After this period the reliability will decline or another source will be required. A further consideration given during the feasibilility study was to require that even in the event of failure to meet the demand fully at least 60% must be met with at least 99% probability.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

sector.narrative: Water sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Water supply and Sanitation - policy, planning and administration
